text: walaqad 'arsalna musaa 'iilaa bani 'iisrayiyl wa'ayadnah balmejzat aldalt ealaa sdqh, wamrnah bi'ana yadeuhum 'iilaa al'iyman; lykhrjhm min aldalal 'iilaa alhda, wydhkkirhm binaeam allah wnqmh fi ayamh, 'iina fi hadha altadhkir biha ladlalat likuli sbbar ealaa taeat allh, waean mharmh, waealaa aqdarh, shakur qayim bihuquq allh, yashkur allah ealaa nemh, wkhssahm bdhlk; li'anahum hum aldhyn yaetabirun bha, wala yaghfulwn enha
